definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The town has a population of 14,000.
sentences.chinese: 泽家镇乃新欣欣九年制学校辖总人口14000人。

sentences.english: By mid-century, urban dwellers will count for seven out of every ten people.
sentences.chinese: 到本世纪中叶，城镇居民将占总人口的十分之七。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 19,000.
sentences.chinese: 潭溪镇炳麟九年制学校辖总人口19000人。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 12,000.
sentences.chinese: 吉首市社塘坡禧福九年制学校辖总人口12000人。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 6,500.
sentences.chinese: 唐家桥思谕小学辖总人口6500人。

sentences.english: Liaoning coast brought area total population 1994 for 293…
sentences.chinese: 1994年辽宁海岸带地区总人口为293。

sentences.english: In the total study population, 11% of the women had undergone a hysterectomy .
sentences.chinese: 在被调查妇女总人口中，11%曾行子宫切除术。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 4,700.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰县官庄乡溪口梁继焜小学辖总人口4700人。

sentences.english: By 2050, 70% of the world’s population will be living in towns and cities.
sentences.chinese: 到2050年，全世界城镇人口将占总人口的70%。

sentences.english: It provides the main livelihood for more than 90% of the population.
sentences.chinese: 从事农林业的人口超过总人口的90%。

sentences.english: Even the number of disabled people exceeds the total population of Britain.
sentences.chinese: 中国的残疾人数量比英国的总人口还要多。

sentences.english: Afro-Americans account for 12% of the US population.
sentences.chinese: 美国黑人约占美国总人口的12%。

sentences.english: The Indonesia Pribumis (Malay) comprises over 80% of the total population.
sentences.chinese: 印泥的马来人占总人口的80%。

sentences.english: Unemployment is 50 percent higher for 20-somethings than the general population.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人的失业率比总人口的比例高出50%。

sentences.english: Sex ratio of total population tended to balance; while birth sex ratio is somewhat higher.
sentences.chinese: 总人口性别结构趋于平衡，但出生人口性别比偏高。

sentences.english: The total population of Mae La Na counts 535 inhabitants, comprising 121 households.
sentences.chinese: 湄拉娜的总人口是535人，由121个家庭组成。

definition: urbanization level (of a city or town)
to govern/to control/having jurisdiction over/linchpin of a wheel (archaic)/noise of a barrow
size (i.e. area) of a country, geographical region or school campus etc/(fig.) scope/extent

pinyin: guo2 min2 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2

definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
